message.original: 竜力の淀みに立ち入るため レオの待つ禊の神殿へ向かう
レオの待つ禊の神殿へ向かう
message.translation: Go to Leo waiting in the Temple of Purification

message.original: 神殿の奥で待つレオの元へ向かう
message.translation: Go to Leo waiting in the back of the temple

message.original: 竜力の淀みし場所へ向かう
message.translation: Go to the location of the Dragon Force Stagnation

message.original: 白竜神殿のセシリーの元へ向かう
message.translation: Go to Cecily in the White Dragon Temple

message.original: 謁見の間のジョゼフに報告する
message.translation: Report back to Joseph in the Audience Chamber
